sentences.sentence: I can't ketch a fly in there, I can't chaw.
sentences.translation: 我不能在那里捉苍蝇，我不能嚼口香糖。

sentences.sentence: I cant ketch a fly in there, I cant chaw. I got to wear shoes all Sunday.
sentences.translation: 在那里我既不能捉苍蝇，也不能嚼口香糖，星期日整天不能赤脚。

sentences.sentence: Maybe Bill he gives him a chaw; maybe he lies and says he ain't got none.
sentences.translation: 也许比尔会给他一口。也许这是他在撒谎，推说自己没有了。
